General.Name: Sportech PLC
General.Description: Sportech PLC, an operator and technology supplier in the gambling market, owns and operates gaming venues in the United Kingdom and North and South America. The company' Sportech Venues segment offers online, mobile, call center, and retail betting from venues located across Connecticut. Its Sportech Digital segment provides lottery software and services, and operates a pari-mutuel betting website. Sportech PLC was incorporated in 1979 and is based in Edinburgh, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: Collins House, Edinburgh, United Kingdom, EH1 2AA
